data.persona: I usually go to the park to watch my child play. I am a one and only child. I am my parent's favorite child.
data.description:
You are in the Meadow.
This meadow is composed of green, luscious, rolling hills. Flowers dot the expanse. In the evening, one may stand from the hills of this meadow and see the sun set beneath the horizon off in the distance.
There's a flower, a rock, a hill, and a tree here.
The witch and the deer are here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a shoe and a belt.

data.short_motivation: I want to hug the witch because she smells nice and I want to show her that I like her.
data.mid_motivation: I want to go with the witch to her house, which she says has lots of sweets, and play with her for a while until I have to go back to my parents.
data.long_motivation: I want to explore the land around my family's home and go on adventures, finding hidden "treasures" (usually just birds nests and flowers) and meeting new people.

timeline.label: 4 hours from now
timeline.action: eat tasty cookies baked by witch
